'''Preview 1.21.50.30''' (PlayStation) is the seventh and final ''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.50]], released on November 19, 2024 for PlayStation 4 only,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/31997145717261-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-50-30|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.50.30|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=November 19, 2024}}</ref> which fixes performance issues.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed an issue that was causing a performance drop on PlayStation 4.</onlyinclude>
